decks.notes: The main idea behind this deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan while deploying aggressive creatures to quickly close out the game. By using cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Spirit of the Labyrinth to slow down your opponent's spells, alongside disruptive lands like Karakas and Rishadan Port, you can control the pace of the game. Additionally, with powerful equipment like Stoneforge Mystic and Solitude to support your creatures, you can apply pressure while protecting your own board. This deck aims to create a difficult board state for your opponent to deal with and secure a victory through efficient aggression.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counterspells, removal, card advantage, and card selection. It utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Jace, the Mind Sculptor to generate card advantage and control the board. The deck also includes powerful removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending to answer threats. With the use of cards like Snapcaster Mage and Mystic Sanctuary, the deck can effectively reuse key spells like Force of Will and Terminus to maintain control and outvalue opponents.

This Legacy Aggro deck focuses on utilizing Ninjas to quickly and efficiently control the game. By using cards like Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow and Ingenious Infiltrator to take advantage of Ninjutsu abilities, the deck can disrupt the opponent's strategy while dealing damage directly. With support from cards like Ornithopter and Baleful Strix for early defense and card draw, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of evasive creatures and disruption spells. Retrofitter Foundry provides additional value by creating artifact creature tokens to further pressure the opponent.

Utilize a combination of graveyards and creature reanimation to quickly bring powerful creatures onto the battlefield, overwhelming opponents with big threats early in the game. Use cards like Entomb and Reanimate to quickly put creatures like Archon of Cruelty or Atraxa, Grand Unifier into play, supported by cards like Brainstorm and Daze to protect your strategy. Take advantage of disruptive elements like Brazen Borrower and Force of Will to control the game, while also utilizing powerful lands like Wasteland and Undercity Sewers for additional advantage.
